fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
- Select two players, swap their roles, 2 uses.
- Select a player, change their role to one of the same alignment.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- You can't self target.
- Your targets are told why their role was changed.
- Your ability is stopped by conversion immunity.
- You don't know the outcome of your ability, or if it fails or succeeds.
